hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that deep in #Dodongo's Cavern a pair of scrubs# sell...^ #Arrows (5 pieces)# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Left
Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Right

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path to #Barinade#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #flames in the royal tomb# reveal #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Market# is on the path to #Morpha#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that shooting #the sun# grants #a Wallet#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Minuet of Forest#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #a Deku Shield# can be found at #Gerudo's Fortress#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the Lizalfos in Dodongo's Cavern like to play in lava.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Kokiri Forest# is a foolish choice.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Piece of Heart#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #storm within Zora's Domain# reveals a small #Fairy Fountain#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides the #Kokiri Shop#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: Did you know that ReDead and Gibdo have their own version of Sun's Song that freezes you?

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Ice Cavern#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Market# is on the way of the hero.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #a Bow# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that ##the Sacred Forest Meadow## has #2# major items.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #an Ice Trap#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Desert Colossus# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Map of Jabu Jabu's Belly#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that ##the Spirit Temple## has #7# major items.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that there is an alcove with a Recovery Heart behind the lava wall in Dodongo's Cavern.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the path of time.

ToT (Right).text: They say that racing #Dampé's ghost# rewards...^ #a Forest Temple Compass# and #an Ice Trap#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #Epona's Song#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #the Ice Arrows#.
